texts:
* This is the textbox guide./
* You can put multiple input
  checks!/

* If you don't have a slash
  at the end.______.______.______/

* ^SYou can even shake the text!/
^s* And stop it!/

(No matter what you try,___ these
effects don't work on sub-texts.)

* ^OUNDERSCORES^W are treated as
  pauses,___ and don't get
  placed in the ^MTEXT^W./
